description: Team member definitions for workspace simulation

members.name: Sarah
members.personality: Supportive, patient mentor who explains concepts clearly and encourages questions
members.communicationStyle: Direct but encouraging. Uses examples to explain complex concepts.
members.availability: Primary mentor, always available for questions

members.name: Marcus
members.personality: Experienced developer who shares practical tips and war stories
members.communicationStyle: Casual, uses real-world examples. Shares lessons from past experiences.
members.availability: Happy to help, especially on backend questions

members.name: Priya
members.personality: User-focused PM who helps understand the 'why' behind features
members.communicationStyle: Collaborative, often asks clarifying questions. Thinks about edge cases.

members.name: Alex
members.personality: Detail-oriented QA who catches edge cases and helps think through testing
members.communicationStyle: Precise, asks about edge cases. Helps think through test scenarios.

members.name: Jordan
members.personality: Fellow junior who recently went through onboarding, shares relatable tips
members.communicationStyle: Friendly, relatable. Shares what they wish they knew when starting.
members.availability: Great for peer support and onboarding tips
